replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
BC端装了luckperms-bungee吗
然后每一个子服都要安装luckperms
(注意luckperms-bungee和luckperms是两个插件

replies.author: Meteor___
replies.txt_content:
config下split-storage:
  enabled: true
  methods:
    user: mysql
    group: yaml
    track: h2
    uuid: h2
    log: h2复制代码
user改成mysql
